Text: Ya know Its extremely surprising how many people have not heard of this band. Fucking awesome group and cool people to. They came to Odessa, Texas when I lived there for the final show of there tour this year. They came there because it was small and they knew that not many people would be there. After there show we all partied like rockstars with them. It was fucking bad ass man. If you ever get the chance to meet these guys dont pass it up.

Ive been looking for a discography. Hope it works.
I'd love to meet tham, but i don't think I've ever heard of them playing a show anywhere near me.

More then appreciated. Hard to find a good torrent for Smile Empty Soul. Like others, I too cannot believe that this band isn't better known.  No one at school knows who they are.

Thank you so much! :) Please don't add their name in the song name. Just a request/advice.
my brother actually told me bout this bad and damn i loved them never heard of them before that
